 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֱיָל‎</span> **noun masculine** ==help== (loan-word from Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***help***, so [[BDB#Lag|Lag]]<sup>Or ii. 7, BN 175</sup>, [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>ZMG 1883, 528</sup>) only in simile <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּגֶבֶר אֵין א‎</span> [[Ps.88.5|Ps 88:5]].
